body_html: @ewilderj How we can improve as community to handle this cases? I really belive that we need to find a Kubernetes like approach. I know that the majority of the dev flow is executed behind the scenes internally and published regularly in brust PR. But I think that we need to adopt an approach like k8s where you can label estimated milestone for github issues.

body: @ewilderj How we can improve as community to handle this cases? I really belive that we need to find a [Kubernetes like approach](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/milestone/38). I know that the majority of the dev flow is executed behind the scenes internally and published regularly in brust PR. But I think that we need to adopt an approach like k8s where you can label estimated milestone for github issues.
